price: Yeroo waan beeksifamu gara haadha teetii (wahyii) beeysifne.
arabic: إِذۡ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: idh awḥaynā ilā ummika mā yūḥā
